Reviews.Title: “Nice Little Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Doug S
Reviews.Content: booked online offseason offseason rate expect pleasantly surprised booking accurate expecting rate booked hotel clean easy directions website yes hey venice youre paying 5 star hotel pleased please dont expect 5star service bellhops people waiting breakfast filling enjoyed juices cereals yoghurts fresh buns meat cheese etc nice table linens linen napkins drawback mattress firm found tough fall asleep stay front staff friendly speak passable english kept secret venice

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel carnival time nights called hotel information direction arriving erica helped personally direction 15 minutes arrived railway station check map map monuments museums visit little bit traditional pretty decor breakfast waitress helpful prepared hot chocolate hesitation recommending hotel thank hotel time

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights awful hotel stayed worse fawlty saying gos bathroom bedroom swing cat breakfast mornings mornings chipped cup stairs filthy hoovered bit love tender care location

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Pantalon is a disaster -a health disaster! Do not stay there!”

Reviews.Content: sent venice week hotel nice photos suited budget allowance read negative reviews sizes positive ruin free time reviews failed mention following endure weeks stay feel essential mention following 1 fleas bed eaten alive night woke hour itching mind legs arms tummy bite marks red swells prove mosquitos bites leave windows etc 2 ants floor ants coming cracks walls base wall meets floor couldnt walk rolling trousers left floor ie suitcase 3 staff unfriendly reviews 4 travelled fair bit hotel allowed key time leave hotel staff leave key ok fair thats rules returned day reception door keys left easy reach passing raid steal items security nightmare appreciate 5 cleaned despite cleaning staff everyday clean bed fashion change bed sheets week provide clean towels toilet rolls raid cupboard near clean towels 6the hotel located alleys lovely explore daytime female traveller feel safe dark lots fights arguments locals evening hotel main tourist strip noise echoed alley location 7 lift helped bags major issue compared 8the lucky sense walk bed english couple stayed night paid week front stuck terrible smell hallway breakfast smelt wet dogs pets allowed hotel bare mind visiting overall experience dirty complete waste money am stuck traveller means average standard served purpose cheaper cheap equals fleas ants rudeness preferred pay little bit positive isnt bus station continental breakfast edible account visiting photos

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel, central Venice”
Reviews.Author: Kathy186302
Reviews.Content: solo trip soon dispelled warm welcome erika reception helpful colleague lady booked single instead usual broom cupboard front street balcony french window pure magic pizza yards hotel amazing food 2 euros portion unbeatable value dorsoduro student residential district lovely walk fine night threatened roof garden winter rest summer

Reviews.Title: “Better than you might think”
Reviews.Author: cappuccino22
Reviews.Content: hotels location looks bit easy reach train bus stations actually main routes piazza roma signposting plenty shops restaurants nearby slept furnished delightful venetian style downers lack hot water 9am smell tobacco smoke thin walls noisy beds breakfast okay pay extra la carte menu desired checking able return afternoon wait coach nicely kept toilets deal asda hotels hard beat

Reviews.Title: “would never stay there again”
Reviews.Author: rodCork
Reviews.Content: paint bedroom peeling wall blanket bed badly werent breakfast food replaced staff helpful nice staying hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous”
Reviews.Author: Mihai64
Reviews.Content: hotel nice elegant hotel fiance pleased hotel arrived receptionist name smiled helped informations time nice breakfast delicious staff hotel located close piazza le dont carry luggage coming thank adina

Reviews.Title: “I would not stay here if I were you!! Buyer beware!”
Reviews.Author: Bissell1
Reviews.Content: hotel location venice nice beds hard bathroom barely toilet using toilet feet rest shower toilet shower close showered entire bathroom wet shower curtain stand type shower beds hard shutters windows allowed mosquitos enter bit sleep safe valuables closet space store clothes mini bar semi reasonable prices breakfast decent morning plus front desk staff helpful illness medic called doctor appreciative hotel ones stayed rome florence looking booked trip sta travel paid front refundable sucked stayed

Reviews.Title: “Beware of ground floor Momolo room far away from the hotel”
Reviews.Author: YUNATONI
Reviews.Content: stayed 15 min walk hotel cant luggage dont called suite dark musty basement ground floor venice people live ground floor granted cheap spoil experience visiting beautiful city little extra decent truly awful

Reviews.Title: “A classic Venetian traveller hotel”
Reviews.Author: Edjamro
Reviews.Content: booked hotel online tour company real gem single shared floor balcony street doublepaned french door window blocked noise closed dont effective warm weather air conditioner relatively spacious laid beautifully decorated venetian style blue gold accents murano glass chandelier hotel located comparatively easy venice staff helpful vaporetto nearby warned cost vaporetto travel exorbitant single ride 650 euro 910 dollars overpriced bring walking shoes
